releaseNotes:
Add ICaptureProcessor interface for using of custom capture code.
      Add IEVRMultiSinkFactory interface for rendering many sources on the one render context.
      Add IEVRStreamControl interface for controlling of rendering many sources on the one render context.
summary: Simple SDK for capturing, recording and streaming video and audio from web-cams on Windows OS by Windows Media Foundation.
title: CaptureManager SDK
